html: So nice to be home and back to work. Lots of work still to do on the TT Greatest Hits. We’re excited for you to hear it. It’s been a treat rooting around all our recordings and giving them a new lease of life. Onwards
text: So nice to be home and back to work. Lots of work still to do on the TT Greatest Hits. We’re excited for you to hear it. It’s been a treat rooting around all our recordings and giving them a new lease of life. Onwards

html: And thank you @MO_HOTELS for making our entrance and exit into Asia so comfortable.
text: And thank you @MO_HOTELS for making our entrance and exit into Asia so comfortable.

html: Thank you @britishairways for bringing us home safely.
text: Thank you @britishairways for bringing us home safely.

html: This morning I bumped into so many British families leaving Bali. How lucky we are to have that choice. I’ve had the misfortune of being in 7 earthquakes but none have felt more deep and raw as last nights. Followed by numerous after shocks. Praying for everyone affected
text: This morning I bumped into so many British families leaving Bali. How lucky we are to have that choice. I’ve had the misfortune of being in 7 earthquakes but none have felt more deep and raw as last nights. Followed by numerous after shocks. Praying for everyone affected

html: Thank you for your concern - we’re all fine - a bit shaken up

html: Just to be clear - I’m terrible at yoga. I’ve never been naturally bendy and have only been practising for about 4 years. However within my head, for my 1 hour on the mat, I’m a yoga master. I really do exist in my own World during my practice. What’s not to love about all that.pic.twitter.com/UmwnkE8aWd
text: Just to be clear - I’m terrible at yoga. I’ve never been naturally bendy and have only been practising for about 4 years. However within my head, for my 1 hour on the mat, I’m a yoga master. I really do exist in my own World during my practice. What’s not to love about all that.pic.twitter.com/UmwnkE8aWd

html: The practice of yoga and meditation brought me to this place. From this peaceful spot the wind whispered to me. “Go forward young warrior for your journey has brought you 6000 miles to here. Relax, lay down your weapons and make sure you have a pina colada sometime soon” #balipic.twitter.com/G489rW4R9d
text: The practice of yoga and meditation brought me to this place. From this peaceful spot the wind whispered to me. “Go forward young warrior for your journey has brought you 6000 miles to here. Relax, lay down your weapons and make sure you have a pina colada sometime soon” #balipic.twitter.com/G489rW4R9d

html: Does anyone else have trouble taking holidays? It usually takes me 5-6 days before I really feel relaxed. Trying to get into the mind set early so I can hit the ground running/relaxing #holidayprep

html: Having some down time means I get some time to do more exercise. I’m so used to cramming a quick work out into 20 minutes but not this week. Having no plans means I’ve got lots of space, peace and quiet. Always a good time for a hike. Especially when the scenery is this good.pic.twitter.com/5SxTDJaufs
